OOC:

Might I just say something?

Pardon my Cybertronian but this exchange I've been
!reading between Recon and Burning Hammer is just
SLAGGING HILARIOUS! I feel like I'm reading a really
really bad fanfic, but that's not a bad thing. It's in
the "so bad it's FRICKIN' HYSTERICAL" category. But
it's oddly Laurel and Hardy-like. Y'know? Just
thinking that somebody actually WROTE THAT and expects
it to be taken seriously makes it laugh out loud pee
your pants funny.

Recon: Hahhaa, fifteen nuclear warheads is not enough,
You cannot harm me, for I am beautiful!

Burning Hammer: La la la la, I'm IGNOOOOORING YOUUUUU!

I'm reminded of when I used to play Transformers with
this friend of mine who lived down the street when I
was a kid. Dude wouldn't accept damage if you paid
him, ESPECIALLY if he was Optimus Prime.

By the way...does anybody notice that kids in toy
commericals in the 80's had THE MOST KICKASS PLACES TO
PLAY? Seriously, they'd always have little
mini-jungles or rocky mountainous areas. I would
always have...the carpet, or my bed...if it was in a
mountainous area where my Decepticons were teaming up
with Cobra Commander to ambush the unsuspecting
Autobots, MAYBE the couch cushins in the floor. Those
kids had it made, man. I swear, you could have shown
them your brand new Fortress Maximus and it STILL
wouldn't have measured up. 

*dreamily* Mmmmmmmm. Fortress Maximus...

Keep up the bad work you two. *ROFLMAO*

I'm going upstairs now to engage in my 52nd viewing of
Transformers: The Movie. BTW, if anybody has all 96
Episodes on tape, you should talk to me. 

Kev.

> "You just can't get it through your thick skull can
> you burning hammer. You 
> were created by the devil, I was created by Primus
> and I was given mighty 
> power for God himself. And I only have mech fluid
> not blood! With the power 
> of God enhancing my spark I will stop you, you shall
> not kill anymore," 
> Recon informs him and forms a golden force field
> bubble around burning 
> hammer.
>
